# webpack-setup
Setup with yarn that supports bootstrap, SVG sprites, animate css and RTL 

```
Webpack Version: 3.3.0
Bootstrap Version: v4.0.0-beta
```

## Run the the following commands:

```
yarn install
yarn start
```

### ğŸ”¥ The generated files are inside "static" folder.

```
http://localhost:9000
```


### ğŸ›© deployment
```
yarn build
```
